title: Blended Course Based on Scholarship of Teaching and Learning (SoTL) to Strengthen Public Administration Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic public administration theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented design for in-service professionals to bridge theory-practice gaps, utilizing digital devices and LMS (Learning Management Systems)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the latest research trends in public administration and apply them to instructional design.
Learners can develop problem-based educational modules for field applications using the Scholarship of Teaching and Learning (SoTL) methodology.
Learners design and implement strategies to enhance engagement in large-scale learner groups within blended learning environments.
Learners can propose an evaluation framework to measure the effectiveness of public administration education.

resources: SoTL (Scholarship of Teaching and Learning) Research Casebook

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
